==== Ubuntu Women ====
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-53/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #53]]</nowiki> with article by new Ubuntu Women Leadership team about team goals
* Team Meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20111013|October 13th]]</nowiki>
* Announced entrants and did poll to select winners of Ada Lovelace Day/Month of Making:
** <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/2011/10/ubuntu-women-month-of-making-vote-now/|Ubuntu Women Month of Making: Vote now!]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/2011/10/ubuntu-women-month-of-making-winners/|Ubuntu Women Month of Making: Winners!]]</nowiki>
* Began drafting of <nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu-women.org/+spec/community-p-ubuntu-women-project-goals|Precise Goals]]</nowiki> blueprint
* Met at UDS session on the 31st for further blueprint drafting
